facts.seriesTitle: Adolescent birth rate (births per 1,000 women aged 15-19 years)
facts.fact_text: The adolescent birth rate declined from 18.3 per 1,000 women aged 15-19 years in 2000 to 7.7 per 1,000 women aged 15-19 years in 2018.
